resources.string:
"Lolu ulwazi olujwayelekile mayelana nale divayisi nokuthi isetshenziswa kanjani, okufana neleveli yebhethri, ukuthi zisetshenziswa kaningi kangakanani izinhlelo zokusebenza, ikhwalithi nobude besikhathi sokuxhumeka kwenethiwekhi (njengeseli, i-Wi-Fi, ne-Bluetooth), nemibiko yokuphahlazeka uma izinto zingasebenzi ngendlela okumele zisebenze ngayo. Luzosetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa imikhiqizo ye-Google namasevisi kuwo wonke umuntu, futhi ngeke lize lihlotshaniswe ne-Akhawunti ye-Google yengane yakho. Olunye ulwazi olulinganiselwe luzosiza ozakwethu, abafana nonjiniyela be-Android, lwenze izinhlelo zabo zokusebenza nemikhiqizo ibe ngcono, futhi.
Ungavula uphinde uvale lokhu noma kunini kuzilungiselelo > Google. Lokhu akuthinti ikhono lale divayisi lokuthumela ulwazi eludingayo ukuze ithole amasevisi abalulekile afana nezibuyekezo zesistimu nokuvikela."

Yenza isipele sedatha yedivayisi ngokuzenzakalelayo (njengamaphasiwedi we-Wi-Fi nomlando wendawo) nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza (njengezilungiselelo namafayela alondolozwe izinhlelo zokusebenza) ku-Google Drayivu. Funda kabanzi

"Uma uvula ukwenza isiphele ngokuzenzakalelayo, idivayisi nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza zilondolozwa kufolda yemfihlo ku-Google Drayivu. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza ingaba idatha noma iyiphi uhlelo lokusebenza elulondolozile (ngokususela kuzilungiselelo zomthuthukisi), kufaka phakathi idatha ezwelayo njengoxhumana nabo, imilayezo, nezithombe.
Idatha eyenziwe isipele ngeke ibale kuya ku-quota yakho yesitoreji sedrayivu. Amafayela amakhulu, noma amafayela onjiniyela abawakhethe ukuwakhipha kusuka kusevisi ngeke enziwe isipele."
Ithuthukisa ukunemba kwendawo ngokuvumela izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi ukuthi askene amanethiwekhi we-Wi-Fi namadivayisi we-Bluetooth, nanoma uma ngabe i-Wi-Fi ne-Bluetooth zivaliwe.

"Lolu ulwazi olujwayelekile mayelana nedivayisi yakho nokuthi uyisebenzisa kanjani, okufana neleveli yebhethri, ukuthi usebenzisa kangakanani izinhlelo zakho zokusebenza, ikhwalithi nobude besikhathi bokuxhumeka kwakho kwenethiwekhi (njengeseli, i-Wi-Fi, ne-Bluetooth), nemibiko yokuphahlazeka uma izinto zingasebenzi ngendlela okumele zisebenze ngayo. Luzosetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa imikhiqizo ye-Google namasevisi kuwo wonke umuntu, futhi ngeke luhlotshaniswe ne-Akhawunti yakho ye-Google. Olunye ulwazi olulinganisiwe luzosiza ozakwethu, abafana nonjiniyela be-Android, benze izinhlelo zabo zokusebenza nemikhiqizo ibe ngcono, futhi.
Ungavula lokhu noma ukuvale noma kunini kuzilungiselelo > Google. Lokhu akuthinti ikhono ledivayisi yakho lokuthumela ulwazi eludingayo ukuze ithole amasevisi abalulekile afana nezibuyekezo zesistimu nokuvikela."
